data.name: ElbmarKs
data.detailed_description:
After surviving more than 3000 years of dissension, fighting and self-destruction finally we learned to leave together with mother nature and each other, but now mankind needs to face a new, never seen, powerful, external enemy.

Nobody knows where they came from but we realized quickly we have to fight to survive.

A small talented scout team gave their life to localize the base of the alien intruders, scientists working day and night created an enhanced version of our probably biggest invention of all time, a teleport that can send the brave human fighters right inside the enemy base.

But the crux is just coming right now, our heroes must search and acquire all the possible information about the enemy base to hopefully be able to destroy it ...


During the game, you must, destroy lurking enemies, or just avoid, take over them, find and use hidden aids, destroy, deactivate and avoid different kinds of gates, get through enemy waves, be patient, accurate, and quick when it's needed, test your memory in the labyrinths.
Do not forget to collect the missing pieces of the enemy base blueprint on each level to get to the next one and be able to unlock new spaceships!

SPOILER!
The game has a physics-based movement system so your space-ship moves with a bit of inertia, it could take a while to get familiar with it, figure out how to avoid or take over e.g. the enemy missiles, but do not give up, it is worth the effort I promise ;)
Precision and accuracy are also key to getting through the levels and you will need stamina too as you only have 3 lives to solve a single level!
data.about_the_game:
After surviving more than 3000 years of dissension, fighting and self-destruction finally we learned to leave together with mother nature and each other, but now mankind needs to face a new, never seen, powerful, external enemy.

Nobody knows where they came from but we realized quickly we have to fight to survive.

A small talented scout team gave their life to localize the base of the alien intruders, scientists working day and night created an enhanced version of our probably biggest invention of all time, a teleport that can send the brave human fighters right inside the enemy base.

SPOILER!
The game has a physics-based movement system so your space-ship moves with a bit of inertia, it could take a while to get familiar with it, figure out how to avoid or take over e.g. the enemy missiles, but do not give up, it is worth the effort I promise ;)

data.short_description: A tribute to the magnificent side-scrolling Arcade shootâ€™-em-up games with a modern look, physics-based movement, and some challenging twists that will test your speed, reflexes, accuracy, patience, and memory at the same time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Intel 64bit or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu, Mint
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
